app.action_not_available_offline: This action isn't available while you are offline.
app.cannot_change_password: Can't change password at this time. Try again later or report an issue in the Help menu.
app.password_reset_email_sent: We've just sent you an email to reset your password.

app.update_is_available: An update is available. Please refresh the page.

beta_migration.completed: Migration complete — this dialog will now close
beta_migration.please_wait: Scripture Forge is now out of Beta — yay! Hold tight while we quickly migrate your account to the new full release version.
beta_migration.recourse: Make sure you aren't using an incognito/private web browser window, and are connected to the Internet. If you continue to have trouble, please {{ templateTagBoundary }}ask for help{{ templateTagBoundary }}.

checking_answers.answer_required_before_saving: You need to enter your answer or record your answer before saving
checking_answers.cannot_like_own_answer: You cannot like your own answer.
checking_answers.recording_automatically_stopped: The recording for your answer was automatically stopped.

checking_audio_player.audio_cannot_be_accessed: There was an error trying to access the audio file. If this persists, please upload a new file.
checking_audio_player.audio_cannot_be_played: This audio cannot be played while you are offline because it has not been downloaded. Connect to the internet to play.
checking_audio_player.audio_cannot_be_previewed: The audio is in a format that cannot be previewed. Save any changes and connect to the internet to play.

checking_audio_recorder.not_available: Your browser currently does not support audio recording. Please try using another supported browser.
checking_audio_recorder.mic_access_denied: Access to your microphone was denied. Please enable the microphone from your browser.

checking_comment_form.comment_cannot_be_blank: You need to enter your comment before saving

checking_comments.show_more_comments_and_unread: Show {{ count }} more comments - {{ unread }} unread

edit_name_dialog.confirm_name: Confirm the name that other people on this project will see when you post answers and comments

error.to_report_issue_email: To report an issue, email {{ issueEmailLink }}.
error.unsupported_browser: You are using an unsupported browser, which may be the reason for this error. We recommend upgrading to the latest {{ chromeLink }} or {{ firefoxLink }}.

exception_handling_service.firefox_private_browsing_or_no_space: Something went wrong. Please check that you are not using Firefox in the unsupported private browsing mode and that your device has the recommended 500 MB of free space.
exception_handling_service.network_request_failed: A network request failed. Some functionality may be unavailable.
exception_handling_service.out_of_space: An error occurred because your device is out of storage space.

file_service.failed_to_save: Failed to save your changes. Please check that you have the recommended 500 MB of free space on your device.
file_service.storage_space_is_limited: The storage space on this device is limited. It is recommended to have a minimum of 500 MB of free space to ensure all feature are available. Please free up storage space.

issue_email.body:
Thanks for reporting the issue!
It would help us if you fill out some of the information below, but please submit even if you can't fill out much.
If you are requesting a feature many of the fields may not be applicable.
Be aware your bug report will be publicly available. Never submit passwords or other secrets.

Bug report
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

Steps to reproduce
For example:
1. Go to ...
2. Click on ...
3. Scroll down to ...
4. See error

Actual behavior
Please describe actual behavior of the issue you are observing.

Expected behavior
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

Screenshots
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your issue.

Additional context
Add any other context about the problem here.

Possible solution
Add any possible solutions to the problem here.

Your environment:
Software                 Version
-----------------------------------------
{{ siteName }} - {{ siteVersion }}
{{ browserName }} - {{ browserVersion }}
{{ operatingSystem }} - {{ operatingSystemVersion }}

URL: {{ url }}
Error id: {{ errorId }}
issue_email.subject: {{ siteName }} issue
